The claim is made by NARAL Pro: Choice Virginia, a pro-choice advocacy group.
The claim is based on a 2011 study condu: a reputable research and advocacy organization.
The study aimed to update a previous est: 4. The study estimated that approximately 30.1% of women aged 15-44 in 2008 would have an abortion by the time they reach 45 if exposed to prevailing abortion rates throughout their reproductive lives.
